Guard - Class in fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.statemachine
A guard is a condition checked at the entrance of a State, just before calling the state Procedure, i.e., the procedure will only be called if the guard returns true.
Guard() - Constructor for class fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.statemachine.Guard
